page.title: 16Events. Helford Area.
page.content: Discos and Dancing held throughout the year,Helford Yacht Club.Sworne Farm St Martin and Manaccan Village Hall. AmateurDramatics: Meet during autumn and winter, produce one or two plays each year at Manaccan. Manaccan Music Group _ Christmas and Easter Concerts, performs outside home area by invitation. Local soloists. EVENTS _ Manaccan Methodist new Sunday School built 1979. Annual Barbeque. St Martin Horticultural Show. Cornish Evening at Sworne, late summer with pig roast, competitions etc. Church Fetes are held in the summer. Flower Festivals at Manaccan church are well worth visiting. Beautiful floral art arranged by members of flower and garden club, church, and local school children.
